pr_title: Make WaitersRuntime a per-service private class

timeline.message:
Make WaitersRuntime a per-service private class

This keeps the runtime as a private implementation detail and no longer a
backwards compat concern as it would be if left as an SdkProtectedApi.

timeline.author: millems

replies.bodyText: Sorry! haha, I didn't even notice until after I opened the PR. It was Intellij's autoformatting I swear.
replies.author: dagnir
